title: MiF
author: MiF
content: Hello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set?

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PMHello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? I am certain that some developers try to time their sale/ico, ido or whatever to happen during the bull market, but that's really hard job to time correctly as reason why people invested icos or idos during bull market wasn't just because bull market. It was because those funding methods were hot back then and pretty much guaranteed minimum 2x for investors. Last bull market it was nft mints and who knows what's going to be hot during next bull so trying to get into hype wagon, devs would need to pay attention daily.Imho developers shouldn't care about the price but focus on the development. In fact usually when price talk is allowed in the official chat, i am not investing into that.

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: Yeah because the market condition during the bull is most favorable for new projects.  During the bear season new projects find it hard to survive because of very low interest from the investors, almost everyone are on stablecoins and not ready to take unreasonable risk with their funds. Even though the market is not fully recovered but it is showing signs of life which is good enough for some projects and while others will rather wait.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PMHello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? The best projects don't care about bull or bear market trends as long as they launch them on time and based on their time table, that's what's important to them.However, there's the significance of releasing a project during the bull run because every investor has got a lot of money to invest and every project has got a lot of money to make.That's why many projects do come during the bull market because it's tested during bear markets that it's not an effective time to release anything about them.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on March 19, 2023, 07:19:16 PM~Imho developers shouldn't care about the price but focus on the development. In fact usually when price talk is allowed in the official chat, i am not investing into that.Totally agree with you, mate! Back in the day, people invested in ICOs and IDOs during the bull market because they were all the rage and pretty much guaranteed investors a sweet return. That is why 99.99% of projects turned out to be scams in the long run.But developers should focus more on the development of their projects than on the price of the tokens. At the end of the day, a project's success should be based on its technological advancements and real-world usefulness, not its price or how popular it is in the crypto market. That is my take on it, anyways.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Because bull markets also involve lots of clueless newbies and investors, so most of these project owners are looking forward to capitalizing and sell their tokens. Most of the tokens/coins are however scams.Real and genuine projects can be created either in bull or bear markets.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Some projects timing their release and during the bull market you can expect more good projects as they are taking advantage the current trend and usually they can have more investors in a bull market. Though some projects didn’t care that much about the trend as they are more focus on their project itself, and it will depend on the investors if they are going to take the risk or just wait for the right timing as well.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: The best time to launch a project is during bull market, if you really want your project to be a successful one, then you should launch it during the bull run, but only few projects are always doing well during the bear market, and they won’t do upto people’s expectations, if a coin is launched and it pumped by 500% during the bull run, if the same project is launched during the bear market, you might just see +100%. That’s why people prefer launching projects during bull run.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: There are projects who are aiming to be released in public at the time of bull market, as they want to join the hyped and be recognized as well by the investors since during bull market, many investors are not afraid to invest on a new projects. Though this will always be depend on the timeline or roadmap of the project, and no one know when is the bull market so instead of waiting for that trend, some projects are doing action now by releasing their project as early as possible so they can work on their improvements as well.

comments.author: Furious 7
comments.body: I personally feel in this case for a good project it's not centered on increasing the price from the start because of course their focus is more on real development first. When they can do that of course the price will follow.As for those who are trying to make projects by taking advantage of current trends, even though not all of them can be said to be bad, on average, I think they will still not meet expectations because this is only gaining momentum and of course conditions like this may not last long.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: The reason is simple. People who make projects want to use the good time when the market is doing well. But when the market goes down, people who invest money get scared and don't want to put their money in new projects. When the market starts to get better, investors wake up and take chances on new projects. But we have to be careful because some bad people try to trick us with fake projects when the market is doing well. So, we need to be smart and not get too excited about new projects. We have to be careful with our money.

comments.author: molsewid
comments.body: Quote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PMHello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? Yes because new projects aims to get more and more investors, in bear market people are afraid to take a risk and spend their money because something might happen. Project owners doesn't want to have a delay launch of their prototypes as well, that's why they more prefer to build or launch their projects when market recovers or when bull run happens.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: This is a normal thing in every market,  once the price of an asset rises the will be a push for a new project to cash in on the wave of the moment. -Likewise, when there is a market crash, some projects will postpone their development to avoid getting into the market at the wrong time,  So whatever market wave we are in, ther are those who either act for or against the market and this is a normal occurrence.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.created_time: March 19, 2023, 11:17:16 PMLast edit: March 19, 2023, 11:34:53 PM by Yatsan
comments.body: Simply because there is a higher probability for new projects to succeed during bullish trend because it is a common belief in this industry, as I assuume. High market demand means high market prices and investors are just reacting to such opportunity. Releasing a project during bearish market would more likely pull your project down leading to unsuccessful release on their public sale.Quote from: molsewid on March 19, 2023, 10:37:36 PMQuote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PMHello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? Yes because new projects aims to get more and more investors, in bear market people are afraid to take a risk and spend their money because something might happen. Project owners doesn't want to have a delay launch of their prototypes as well, that's why they more prefer to build or launch their projects when market recovers or when bull run happens. Indeed, this assumption does not mean that things are absolute just like there is a pattern. It is just a common belief which creates a big wave in the demand. Unfortunately, many potent projects were drowned during bearish market. Simply shows that timing is really something to be considered.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PMHello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? Yes, it could be that this developers is waiting for the right time to go live with their projects. And as we all know, all roads to BTC, so they wait for time where the price is really going up, like in a bull run that we are experiencing right now, so it might be a good strategy. However, we should also think that timing might just be one factor behind the success or shall I say the pump (and then follow by dumping if that is the case). The project must be solid from ground up, developers are very active and it should be unique, at least they have something to offer to the public and the potential end user of it. Maybe if we can see which projects rolled out this week, and we can gauge them in the next coming months if they become successful because of the time or the project was simply a pump and dump.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Most want to take advantage of the pricing and the hype surrounding the bull run, that's why we're seeing new projects popping out here and there. My advice: do not buy in to these newly-born projects that are only good during the bull run. Stick with projects that stood the test of time and are still delivering results no matter the weather in the market. Those are the only projects you will make money from in the long run, and you're sure that your money will never be scammed after they have put every token in the exchanges.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on March 19, 2023, 08:37:06 PMBecause bull markets also involve lots of clueless newbies and investors, so most of these project owners are looking forward to capitalizing and sell their tokens. Most of the tokens/coins are however scams.Real and genuine projects can be created either in bull or bear markets.I tend to agree with this idea and I noticed this too.When there's a bull market, new investors will arise and this is the target of the developers or other owners of the project because they are more confident in the market's potential for growth and are therefore more willing to take risks and invest resources into new ventures thinking that it's that just easy to get quick rich by investing a new project during a bull market.Knowing the fact that even if there is a bull or bear market if you build a genuine project it will always succeed because the decision to launch a project is up to the individual developers and investors involved while IMO, the market conditions can certainly play a role in shaping their decisions.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PMHello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? When the market is surging and bullish lots of developers are taking advantage of the bullish sentiment of the market which is why most of these developers area launching their projects during the bull market.  Many of these projects are even half-baked just to get in sync with the market's bullishness.  But picking projects to invest in during bullish market does not guarantee success or profit because many of these projects are just into milk investors of their money.  So whether it is a bear market or a bullish market, we must do our research and be vigilant in choosing a project to invest in.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PMHello i just want to ask if i you guys also notice when the bitcoin rise there are also a lot of new projects come out and if bitcoin fall there are only few projects build, is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? That is just an old story. new projects will be making so many people throw their money easily. I guess that if it's also triggering scammers to come up with scam projects as well. There are also so many successful projects built during the bearish market. It's all depends on the project developers. The bullish trend was just giving more demand to the project. The new project found how easy to attract money to come in during the bullish project compared with the bearish market. It's caused by there will be many people interested to doubling or tripling their money easily without needed any effort by investing into the new project but the problem is there would be so many people who had zero knowledge tried to inves blindly without doing any research before.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: Quote from: MiF on March 19, 2023, 06:57:27 PM(...), is it because some projects developer notice that most of the successful projects are build in bull market and most of the projects build on bear market are failed? Or they don't care about bull and bear market and they build thier project because the time is already been set? Actually I was interested in some dev teams and got to know some of the onchain systems they work to bring to market pre-existing products.And the problem here is that the market must attract people to invest in it, when there is cash flow, it will be different from those who want to bring products to make money. Depending on the purpose, the ability of the team behind the new project to survive or end is through hacks or drama respectively.
